data.name: For What Will Come
data.detailed_description:
Mature Content Warning

The developer describes the content like this:

For What Will Come, may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages. The game contains bad language in the form of the protagonist cursing.


About the Game

Embark down the small path of a girl named Abby as she goes back home and digs through her childhood, reliving the past to help reveal what happened to her family.


You moved out of state and left your family behind to pursue your dreams, You've become more successful then they would have thought. You live on your own, you make a decent bit of money and life is going by smoothly.


You finally decide to travel back and visit with your family. What happens next is for you to discover, will this mystery end with you, or will it just be another story that was forgotten about?

Key Features


    •No Traditional Puzzles or Combat: For What Will Come relies on the story and exploration, no need to get worked up over a puzzle you can't solve or gory violence.

    •Semi-Linear: Take your time and freely explore different areas of the game while still pushed in a certain direction, unlock new areas by proceeding through others or traverse back through the areas you previously explored. You never know what you might discover.

Key Features


    •No Traditional Puzzles or Combat: For What Will Come relies on the story and exploration, no need to get worked up over a puzzle you can't solve or gory violence.

    •Semi-Linear: Take your time and freely explore different areas of the game while still pushed in a certain direction, unlock new areas by proceeding through others or traverse back through the areas you previously explored. You never know what you might discover.
data.short_description: Return to your childhood home in hopes to see your family, uncover the secrets behind your family's disappearance. What will you uncover? Will the family mystery end with you, or never be thought of again..
